keywords.description: Show available keywords and what they do
Get current weather conditions and 5-day forecast
Get an AI-powered opinionated weather report
Get current NFL game scores. Optionally provide a date (YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD) to look up scores for a specific date; otherwise returns the most recent scoreboard.
keywords.abilityText: Get NFL game scores — optionally specify a date (e.g. 'nfl scores 20260208') for that day's games, otherwise returns the current/most recent scoreboard

keywords.description: Get latest NFL news headlines. Optionally provide a filter word to narrow results (e.g. 'nfl news chiefs').
keywords.abilityText: Get NFL news headlines — optionally add a filter word to narrow articles (e.g. 'nfl news draft')

keywords.description: Analyze the context and generate the most relevant assessment based on the context
